RESOURCE.NAME: Cebuano POS Tagger
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Mark Hepple's Brill-style POS tagger, adapted for languages where entries are multiword

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the lexicon file

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the ruleset file

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding to be used for the ruleset and lexicon files

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerFeatureSeparator
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The character used to separate features for entries in gazetteer lists. Accepts strings like " " and will unescape it to the relevant character. If not specified, this gazetteer does not support extra features.

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer diferentiate on case?

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: longestMatchOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match the longest string starting from any offset?

PARAMETER.NAME: wholeWordsOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match whole words?

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerFeatureSeparator
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The character used to separate features for entries in gazetteer lists. Accepts strings like " " and will unescape it to the relevant character. If not specified, this gazetteer does not support extra features.

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer diferentiate on case?

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: longestMatchOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match the longest string starting from any offset?

PARAMETER.NAME: wholeWordsOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match whole words?

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: tokeniserRulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the rules file

PARAMETER.NAME: transducerGrammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the postprocessing transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Cebuano Transducer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A module for executing Jape grammars.

PARAMETER.NAME: grammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the grammar file.

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the grammar

PARAMETER.NAME: ontology
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The ontology to be used by this transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: operators
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Class names that implement gate.jape.constraint.ConstraintPredicate.

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationAccessors
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Class names that implement gate.jape.constraint.AnnotationAccessor.

PARAMETER.NAME: binaryGrammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the binary grammar file.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Cebuano Transducer Postprocessor
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A module for executing Jape grammars.

PARAMETER.NAME: grammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the grammar file.

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the grammar

PARAMETER.NAME: ontology
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The ontology to be used by this transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: operators
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Class names that implement gate.jape.constraint.ConstraintPredicate.

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationAccessors
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Class names that implement gate.jape.constraint.AnnotationAccessor.

PARAMETER.NAME: binaryGrammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the binary grammar file.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process
